#!/bin/bash

CERT_NAME="iPhone Developer: san zhang (89K23U43HU)"
DIR="~/project/embedded/framewrok/"

cd $DIR
for i in *.framework; do
    codesign -fs ${cert_name} ${i}
done
exit
